channel.title: Portal Help
channel.description:
I've been stuck on this for a while, I need help how to make a portal have multiple options like this.
King Black Dragon Kalphite Queen Barrows Bank Area
How would i make it like that.
Can you make it for [PI] and [CZAR]
Thanks!

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Actually I’m not sure if it will work. It will probably just teleport you and then do the gfx’s and emote because there’s no delay between any of them. (I don’t think)

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

It’s a delta, Also… I am using it because i saw that method for other GFX’S.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

What’s with the

if(gfx == 111)

??

Sorry I know nothing about PI sources.

But I’m guessing that’s not the thing used to send GFX.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Is this looking better?

[code=java]case 7322:
//Boss Portals
sendOption5(“Godwars”, “King Black Dragon”, “Kalphite Queen”, “Chaos Elemental”, “”);
c.triggerTele = 3;
break;
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//GodWars Teleport
triggerTele(2860, 3811, 1);
if(gfx == 111)
setAnimation(714);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//King Black Dragon
triggerTele(3007, 3849, 0);
if(gfx == 111)
setAnimation(714);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//Kalphite Queen
triggerTele(####, ####, #);
if(gfx == 111)
setAnimation(714);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//Chaos Elemental
triggerTele(3295, 3921, 0);
if(gfx == 111)
setAnimation(714);

break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Under the trigger tele put your emotes and gfx’s in.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Thank-you very much sir, I’d give you rep but i can’t. (I’ll give you rep when i get 15).

Also, How do i get it to do the GFX and Emote?

P.S: Whats a good PI for a learner, It’ll be my first ever PI.

[hr]

Can someone make em one for delta, I’ve got this so far.

[code=java]case 7322:
//Boss Portals
sendOption5(“Godwars”, “King Black Dragon”, “Kalphite Queen”, “Chaos Elemental”, “”);
c.triggerTele = 3;
break;

} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//GodWars Teleport
triggerTele(2860, 3811, 1);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//King Black Dragon
triggerTele(3007, 3849, 0);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//Kalphite Queen
triggerTele(####, ####, #);
} else if (c.triggerTele == 3) {
//Chaos Elemental
triggerTele(3295, 3921, 0);

break;[/code]

Can anyone help me fix the code?

Thanks,

SacredHeart!

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

[pi]I already did that to my server I just used it from teleport spells
ActionHandler.java

case 7322: //Boss teleport c.getDH().sendOption5("Godwars", "King Black Dragon", "Dagannoth Kings", "Chaos Elemental", ""); c.teleAction = 3; break;
Then ClickingButtons.java
Search for: if (c.teleAction == 1) { //and you will see 1st teles 2rd teles and so… TeleAction == 3 is what we need 1rd teles,2rd teles means 1 option 2 option like 1 option is godwars so 1rd teles (teleaction ==3) will be godwars teleport 2rd teles will be kbd tele 3rd tele dag kings 4rd tele chaos ele…
1rd teles

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //godwars teleport c.getPA().spellTeleport(2860, 3811, 1);
2rd teles

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //kbd c.getPA().spellTeleport(3007, 3849, 0);
3rd teles

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //dag kings c.getPA().spellTeleport(2479, 10147, 0);

4rd teles

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //chaos elemental c.getPA().spellTeleport(3295, 3921, 0);
5rd teles

} else if (c.teleAction == 3) { //Unused boss teles spot c.sendMessage("Suggest something for this spot on the forums!"); c.getPA().closeAllWindows();

Also c.getPA().spellTeleport(3295, 3921, 0) //You should change to samthing like that so its will not do teleport emutes and gfx c.getPA().movePlaye(3295, 3921, 0)

Read full topic
